author: Maxwell Libra
text:
We will never get to see her finish this game. Rushia, I know you have hardships right now. I just want to say thank you for the 2 years of fun and memories that you gave to us. I will miss your gentle voice, your screams and you getting jealous to us watching other girls. I wish nothing but you to have a wonderful life outside hololive after your termination. I know its hard, but life goes on and we keep moving forward for tomorrow. I will never forget all the fun memories you gave to us. And we will be forever grateful to that. Im sure you will not be able to read this, but I will still comment it here to vent my gratitude towards you. For the last time, Arigato gozaimasu Uruha Rushia.

To all fandeads out there: Life is harsh, there are ups and downs. But remember that its not the end. There will always be a new beginnings in life. Lets pray for the best of her in life.


-An overseas fan of Uruha Rushia
